about_the_game:
In Townframe you will become a Townframer, whose task is to transform the appearance of towns according to the wishes of various clients.



Buy tools to uncover hidden things with a magnifying glass, change the wind direction in the scene, take interesting photos or listen to the soundscape of the towns to solve the little story puzzles in the world of Townframe.



And explore a world full of uniquely crafted locations and characters at your own pace.



KEY FEATURES

  • Simple Controls
    Play with just a mouse. Left / right mouse button for interaction and mouse wheel for zoom.
  • Handmade Levels
    All levels are uniquely designed to surprise you each time in a different way.
  • Tiny Stories
    Each character tells you a little story about their relationship to their town.
  • Relaxing Music
    It has a very cute and relaxing soundtrack composed by Peter Kirschstein.
  • Kind & funny Characters
    Many different characters that have their own personality.
  • Humor
    Some humor between the lines can also be found.
  • Very playful and for all ages
    The focus of the game is on the playful and fun experience, accessible to all genereations (reading is necessary).
  • Optional Levels
    You don't have to finish all puzzles to finish the game and you can also choose later on a map in which order you want to solve some puzzles.
  • Perfect for a relaxing evening
    The game is 2 - 3 hours long.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (or higher)
  • Processor: Dual Core from Intel or AMD, 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX 480
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: A relaxing puzzle game where you recreate towns from people's memories. These people will give you written puzzles and to solve them you'll be able to either modify the buildings or use different tools, such as one that makes wind, and many others. Each puzzle will surprise you in a different way.
